biotools.summary:
SSMD: Semi-Supervised Mouse data Deconvolution. A semi-supervised approach for a robust cell type identification and deconvolution of mouse transcriptomics data.

Deconvolution of mouse transcriptomic data is challenged by the fact that mouse models carry various genetic and physiological perturbations, making it questionable to assume fixed cell types and cell type marker genes for different dataset scenarios.
